Metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27827 affecting package lldpd for versions less than 1.0.14-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2020-27827 affecting package lldpd for versions less than 1.0.14-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package lldpd is earlier than 1.0.14-1, affected by CVE-2020-27827
